title: Estimating Derivative
text: Find the slope of the tangent line at f(1).

title: Slope Equation
text: The equation for finding the slope is $$\frac{y_2-y_1}{x_2-x_1}$$.
speech: The equation for finding the slope is  fraction, y sub 2 minus y sub 1, over, x sub 2 minus x sub 1,  .
